name: Recovery Workout Template
description: Template for generating active recovery workouts
prompt:
Design an active recovery {sport} workout for an athlete who completed {previous_workout} yesterday.

Recovery Goals:
- Duration: {duration} minutes
- Keep heart rate below {recovery_hr_max} bpm
- Include mobility work for {problem_areas}

The workout should:
1. Start very easy (Zone 1)
2. Include dynamic movements
3. Avoid any high-intensity efforts
4. Incorporate breathing exercises
5. End with stretching routine

Consider the athlete's fatigue level: {fatigue_level}/10

variables.recovery_hr_max: Maximum heart rate for recovery (usually 65-70% of max)
variables.problem_areas: Areas needing extra attention (hips, calves, shoulders, etc.)
